title: Through A Dark Wood: A Look at Dante with Richard Rohlin
description:
Richard Rohlin was kind enough to join me again in my journey into meaning. In this chat we explore Dante's Divine Comedy.

Listen to the podcast form here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Through-A-Dark-Wood-A-Look-at-Dante-e17dlkt

The original article Richard sent me: https://aeon.co/essays/the-fractal-consciousness-of-dantes-divine-comedy

Richard's Tolkien podcast: https://www.ancientfaith.com/podcasts/amonsul?fbclid=IwAR1mjPqCRMw5g5rCUmcXN76d2sIw1uPIS5XjzfwL8vsXQs4DCXd5C6Q8B5Y

Richard's book: https://www.amazon.com/Amid-Weeping-There-Joy-Perspectives/dp/1951536126?fbclid=IwAR2svSjzvGSRbWtgecgr1anGFndH-2NJvTPbIBKjQ9PryfvDY1QEwHcg5Gs

follow me on twitter @andrealynnlewis 
email me at andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
